WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Resolved in the latest source code.

The fix was to use Tag.DisplayName when displaying the name in a view.

You should now see the # in all display cases except via the MetaWeblogAPI GetCategories method. I'm looking at enabling it there as well
WorkItem.Description: If you have a tag like c#, f# or asp.net the symbols are removed :(

Comments.Message: # isn't a legal character for anywhere in a url except for the hash so it should be removed.  The bug here is that we somehow lost the functionality of having a DisplayName for tags.  The Name should be set to something URL friendly and the DisplayName should be set to exactly what you typed in.  We'll look into it, thanks!
